mapper.select: SELECT CST_SV_ASN_NO FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ WHERE 1=1 AND CST_SV_ASN_NO = #{cstSvAsnNo} AND ASN_OJ_YM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{crdovrYm}, 'YYYYMM'), -1), 'YYYYMM') AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
SELECT '2' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || LPAD(SQ_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ$CST_SV_ASN_NO.NEXTVAL, 10, '0') AS NEW_CST_SV_ASN_NO FROM DUAL
